meanings.definition: The quality or state of being morose.
meanings.sent1: Her morosenesses made it hard to cheer her up.
meanings.sent2: His morosenesses lifted when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: Despite his morosenesses, he couldn't resist laughing at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds mirrored his morosenesses as he walked alone.
meanings.sent5: The weight of her morosenesses hung heavy in the room.
